version_description:
Level up movie night with our latest updates for iPhone, iPad and iMessage.
• Instantly see what’s in theaters and view upcoming ticket purchases with the Today widget in the Fandango app extension.
• We’ve gotten rid of few bugs and made moviegoing even easier.

Level up movie night with our latest updates for iPhone, iPad and iMessage.
•Save time and instantly purchase movie tickets by securely scanning your credit card with your phone’s camera.
•We’ve squashed the bugs for a smoother, speedier moviegoing experience.

Level up movie night with our latest updates:
* Access your upcoming movie tickets faster and easier than ever now available right when you open the app.
* Now check showtimes directly on your Apple Watch.
* Watch the latest movie trailers right in our iMessage app.
* Check out Fandango VIP+. Buy tickets. Earn points. Get movies on us.
* Bug fixes and performance enhancements

* Bug fixes and performance enhancements

Level up movie night with our latest updates:
* We’ve gotten rid of the bugs to improve your moviegoing experience, making it even easier to access the latest showtimes and secure tickets
* Get an alert the moment tickets go on sale. Use our FanAlert™ to be the first to know when tickets are available

Level up movie night with our latest updates:
* With Siri shortcuts we’ve made it even easier to view showtimes, buy tickets, and scan your ticket at the theater - all you have to do is ask.
* Use Face ID on your iPad Pro to securely sign in to your account, buy tickets, and more.

Welcome Back to Movie Theaters! Fandango helps you go back to the movies with confidence and peace of mind.
*COVID-19 POLICIES: Check new guest safety procedures announced by theaters.
*SOCIAL DISTANCE: Feel safer with social distance seating and contactless tickets.
*WORRY-FREE REFUNDS & EXCHANGES: Get refunds and exchanges up until posted showtime, and now you can self-process refunds as a guest user – no account required.

Welcome Back to Movie Theaters! Fandango helps you go back to the movies with confidence and peace of mind.

Welcome Back to Movie Theaters! Fandango helps you go back to the movies with confidence and peace of mind.
* FIND OPEN THEATERS: Apply filters to easily find open theaters near you.
* COVID-19 POLICIES: Check new guest safety procedures announced by theaters.
* SOCIAL DISTANCE: Feel safer with social distance seating and contactless tickets.
* WORRY-FREE REFUNDS & EXCHANGES: Get refunds and exchanges up until posted showtime, and now you can self-process refunds as a guest user – no account required.
